trans-unit.source: Provides digital rights management services for encrypting and decrypting protected content.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce diritti digitali servizi di gestione per crittografare e decrittografare contenuto protetto.

trans-unit.source: CryptoProvider is created as a result of the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A> method when binding a rights managed <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> to a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.
trans-unit.target: CryptoProvider creato come risultato del <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>metodo quando si associa un rights Management <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>a un <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.SecureEnvironment> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense.Bind%2A>

trans-unit.source: As with other <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement> types, CryptoProvider is only usable in full trust applications.
trans-unit.target: Come con gli altri <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>tipi, CryptoProvider è disponibile solo in applicazioni con attendibilità totale.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement>

trans-unit.source: Gets the cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la dimensione del blocco di crittografia, in byte.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*BlockSize bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: Il `clearText` e `cipherText` buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>e <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>deve essere n * dimensioni del blocco byte di lunghezza, in cui "n" è un numero intero maggiore o uguale a 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `false`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>è `false`, buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>deve essere uguale alla lunghezza dei buffer passati a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A> is `true`, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of BlockSize bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>è `true`, buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>può avere una lunghezza diversa rispetto ai buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(tutte le dimensioni del buffer devono essere comunque sempre un multiplo di dimensioni del blocco di byte di lunghezza).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanMergeBlocks%2A>

trans-unit.source: A BlockSize of 1 indicates that the cipher is a stream cipher; a BlockSize of 2 or greater indicates a block cipher.
trans-unit.target: Dimensioni del blocco di 1 indica che la crittografia è flussi; dimensioni del blocco di 2 o versioni successive indica una crittografia a blocchi.

trans-unit.source: The cipher block size, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: La dimensione del blocco crittografato, in byte.

trans-unit.source: The default block size for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] is 8.
trans-unit.target: La dimensione di blocco predefinito per [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] è 8.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection listing the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta che elenca i diritti che superato la verifica e che siano state concesse all'utente.

trans-unit.source: A collection enumerating the rights that passed verification and that are granted to the user.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta che sottoposti a verifica e che enumera i diritti vengono concessi all'utente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'utente dispone dei diritti per decrittografare.

trans-unit.source: CanDecrypt returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user read access rights such as View, Edit, Print, or Owner.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce CanDecrypt **true** se il <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>associati a questo <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>concede all'utente i diritti di accesso in lettura, ad esempio visualizzare, modificare, stampare o proprietario.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to decrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se il <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> concede i diritti utente di decrittografare; in caso contrario, **false**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the user has rights to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se l'utente dispone dei diritti per la crittografia.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A> returns **true** if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense> bound to this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> grants the user write access rights such as Edit or Owner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>Restituisce **true** se il <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense>associati a questo <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>concede all'utente i diritti di accesso in scrittura, ad esempio modifica o proprietario.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense></xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.CanDecrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"></xref> grants the user rights to encrypt; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true** se il <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.UseLicense"> </xref> concede i diritti utente per la crittografia; in caso contrario, **false**.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> can accept buffers that are different block sizes in length.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se <> </> *> e <> </> *> può accettare lunghezza dei blocchi di buffer sono diversi.

trans-unit.source: The `clearText` and `cipherText` buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> must be n*<xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length, where 'n' is an integer greater than or equal to 1. If CanMergeBlocks is **false**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> must be the same length as the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>. If CanMergeBlocks is **true**, buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> can be a different length from the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> (all buffer sizes must still always be a multiple of <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> bytes in length).
trans-unit.target: Il `clearText` e `cipherText` buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>e <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>deve essere n* <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> byte di lunghezza, in cui "n" è un numero intero maggiore o uguale a 1.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> Se è CanMergeBlocks * *false**, buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>deve essere uguale alla lunghezza dei buffer passati a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A> Se è CanMergeBlocks * *true**, buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>può avere una lunghezza diversa rispetto ai buffer passato a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A>(tutte le dimensioni del buffer devono essere comunque sempre un multiplo di <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>byte di lunghezza).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt%2A> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt%2A>

trans-unit.source: **true** if the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> can be a different length from the buffer passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*>; otherwise, **false** if the buffers passed to <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Encrypt*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Decrypt*> must be the exact same length.
trans-unit.target: **true** se il buffer passato a <> </> *> può avere una lunghezza diversa rispetto al buffer passato a <> </> *>; in caso contrario, **false** se il buffer passato a <> </> *> e <> </> *> deve essere la stessa lunghezza esatta.

trans-unit.source: For [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] the default is **true**.
trans-unit.target: Per [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] il valore predefinito è **true**.

trans-unit.source: Decrypts cipher text to clear text.
trans-unit.target: Esegue la decrittografia di testo per cancellare il testo crittografato.

trans-unit.source: The cipher text to decrypt.
trans-unit.target: Testo crittografato da decrittografare.

trans-unit.source: The decrypted clear text of cryptoText.
trans-unit.target: Il testo decrittografato di cryptoText .

trans-unit.source: cipherText is null.
trans-unit.target: cipherTextè null.

trans-unit.source: Decryption right not granted.
trans-unit.target: Decrittografia diritto non concessa.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Dispose performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Dispose esegue <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>occupata.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> </xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()`(metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>riferimenti.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Encrypts clear text to cipher text.
trans-unit.target: Crittografa testo non crittografato in testo crittografato.

trans-unit.source: The byte length of the `clearText` buffer should be a multiple of the cipher <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La lunghezza in byte del `clearText` buffer deve essere un multiplo della <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.BlockSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital rights management system uses [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] block cipher.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale rights management utilizzi del sistema [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-aes-md.md)] la crittografia a blocchi.

trans-unit.source: With [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], blocks are encrypted independently such that two blocks of identical clear text produce identical cipher text results.
trans-unit.target: Con [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_aes](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-aes-md.md)], i blocchi vengono crittografati in modo indipendente in modo che due blocchi di testo non crittografato identici producono risultati in formato testo crittografato identici.

trans-unit.source: To minimize potential decryption threats from independent block encryption, applications should employ methods to modify content, such as compression, to avoid encrypting identical clear text blocks.
trans-unit.target: Per ridurre al minimo i potenziali minacce di decrittografia da crittografia a blocchi indipendenti, le applicazioni devono utilizzare metodi per modificare il contenuto, ad esempio la compressione, per evitare la crittografia a blocchi di testo non crittografato identici.

trans-unit.source: The clear text content to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: Contenuto di testo non crittografato da crittografare.

trans-unit.source: Encrypted cipher text of the given clearText.
trans-unit.target: Testo crittografato del determinato clearText .

trans-unit.source: clearText is null.
trans-unit.target: clearTextè null.

trans-unit.source: Encryption is not permitted.
trans-unit.target: Crittografia non è consentita.

trans-unit.source: Frees resources and performs internal cleanup before the instance is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente di liberare risorse ed esegue la pulitura interna prima che l'istanza viene recuperata tramite garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Finalize performs <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Finalizzare esegue <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>(~ / add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.CryptoProvider.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue l'override <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il codice dell'applicazione non deve chiamare questo metodo. un oggetto `Finalize` metodo viene richiamato automaticamente durante l'operazione di garbage collection, a meno che la finalizzazione del garbage collector non è stata disabilitata da una chiamata al <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [metodi Finalize e distruttori](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
